# ubep.azure

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://lifecycle.r-lib.org/articles/stages.html#experimental)
[![CRAN status](https://www.r-pkg.org/badges/version/ubep.azure)](https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=ubep.azure)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of ubep.azure is to provide wrappers to common tasks on Azure executed at the Unit of Biostatistics Epidemiology and Public Health (UBEP) of the University of Padova.

## Installation

You can install the development version of ubep.azure like so:

``` r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("UBESP-DCTV/ubep.azure")
```
